name: Flying Car City Stunts
description:
Flying Car City Stunts is an innovative adrenaline fueled, action, 3D driving and jumping igry. Spread level simulation of a flooded city with high buildings. Game gives you the opportunity to drive extreme transformer truck and fly turbo airplane. Use your experience of driving monster trucks and sports and racing cars and fly these future flying cars as high as you can. Test your air craft pilot skills and car driving skills both at the same time in this flying simulation game. This game also allows you to stunt around both on the roads and in the sky using the same vehicle.
Features;
- Futuristic flying car models
- Realistic and dynamic car and flying physics
- Huge immersive city environment
- Highly modified car models
- Cutting edge 3D graphics
